name: governstack-dao-hub
description: Comprehensive Governance DAO platform on Stacks (BTC L2)

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.deploy:testnet: clarinet deployments generate --testnet && clarinet deployments apply -p deployments/default.testnet-plan.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: clarinet deployments generate --mainnet && clarinet deployments apply -p deployments/default.mainnet-plan.yaml
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install

author: GovernStack Team
